title: Crazy Love by Michelle Pace epub
description:
After dropping out of law school, Sam Beaumont fears coming home will either be like sucking poison out of snakebite or drowning in a bathtub of gin. He dreads the whirlwind of being a blue-blood in Savannah, and between his mother and his brother a peaceful existence is out of the question.

Miles away from her ugly past, Annie Clarke is thriving in pharmacy school. Uncomfortable with her own success, she begins to fall back to her self-sabotaging ways. 

Then along comes Trip Beaumont, a hot, edgy artist. Every instinct in her says run, which only makes him that much more tempting. The day she finally agrees to go out with him, his younger brother, Sam, shows up. SamÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s first words about Trip chill her: Ã¢â‚¬Å“DonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t be fooled by the act. Prince Charming is a toxic monster.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ 

Annie soon sees that SamÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s callous exterior is a direct result of coping with a family as dysfunctional as her own. Could love shield them both from spiraling into madness, or will their crazy worlds collide like renegade storm fronts leaving devastation and destruction in their wake?
